original_text: As a result, the great city of Babylon broke into three parts. When the ground shook, it also destroyed the big cities of other nations in the world. God did not forget the evil things that the people of the great city of Babylon had done. So they had to drink wine from the cup of God's great anger.
korean_text: 큰 성이 세 갈래로 갈라지고 만국의 성들도 무너지니 큰 성 바벨론이 하나님 앞에 기억하신 바 되어 그의 맹렬한 진노의 포도주 잔을 받으매

sentences.original_text: As a result, the great city of Babylon
it also destroyed the big cities
of other nations in the world
the evil things that the people of the great city of Babylon had done
sentences.korean_translation: 위대한 바빌론 도시 사람들이 행한 악한 일들을

sentences.original_text: So they had to drink wine
from the cup of God's great anger
